title: PHPgetcwd()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPgetcwd()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Get the current working directory:
<?php
echo getcwd();
?>
Result:
/home/php
Definition and Usage
The getcwd() function returns the current working directory.
Syntax
getcwd()
Technical Details
Return Value:
The current working directory on success, FALSE on failure.
PHP Version:
4.0+

★
+1
